sentences.en: " There glimmered the embroidered letter, with comfort in its unearthly ray. "
sentences.cn: 她 胸前 绣着的字母闪着的非凡的光辉, 将温暖舒适带给他人.

sentences.en: All of a sudden we heard an unearthly cry.
sentences.cn: 我们突然听到一声怪叫.

sentences.en: For a few seconds we watched the unearthly lights on the water.
sentences.cn: 有那么几秒钟，我们注视着水面上那些奇异的光。

sentences.en: He could hear the unearthly scream of some curlew piercing the din.
sentences.cn: 他可以听到一些杓鹬所发出的那种穿透喧嚣的诡异叫声.

sentences.en: His eyes shone with an unearthly light.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛里闪着奇异的光。

sentences.en: In the unearthly silence my colleagues must have wondered what I had done.
sentences.cn: 在那一阵子奇怪的沉默当中,我的同事必定感到纳闷,想知道我做了什么.

sentences.en: She heard the sirens scream their unearthly wail.
sentences.cn: 她听到警报器发出可怕的尖叫声。

sentences.en: The sound was so serene that it seemed unearthly.
sentences.cn: 那种声音听起来是那么宁静，仿佛天外之音。

sentences.en: The temples, too, in their ruin have a moonlight magic, an unearthly excellence.
sentences.cn: 这些庙宇在它们的废墟中也有一种月光般的魅力, 超然出世之美.

sentences.en: The unearthly silence was broken by a shrill screaming.
sentences.cn: 一声尖叫打破了这可怕的沉寂。

sentences.en: There was silence again, an unearthly silence, more trying than hideous din.
sentences.cn: 又是沉默, 可怕的沉默比低声的喧骚更令人难受.

sentences.en: They arranged to meet in Riverside Park at the unearthly hour of seven in the morning.
sentences.cn: 他们约定一大清早7点在河滨公园见面。

sentences.en: When she was calm, there seemed unearthly beauty in the change.
sentences.cn: 当她宁静的时候, 在这种变化中仿佛有着非凡的美.

sentences.en: Why call me at this unearthly hour?
sentences.cn: 怎么在这个时候叫醒我?

sentences.en: Why do you wake me up at this unearthly hour?
sentences.cn: 你为什么在这个鬼时候叫醒我?

sentences.en: Why should I get up at this unearthly hour?
sentences.cn: 为什麽我得这麽早起床?

trans.tran_cn: 超自然的，神秘的，可怕的，早得或不便得离谱的
trans.tran_en: very strange and unnatural, and probably frightening
